properties.name: maxLength
properties.description: the largest positive representable number. The largest negative representable number is maxLength.

properties.name: maxErrorMsg
properties.description: Error Message required to displayed after validation of maxLength

properties.name: minLength
properties.description: The smallest positive representable number -- that is, the positive number closest to zero (without actually being zero). The smallest negative representable number is -minLength.

properties.name: minErrorMsg
properties.description: Error Message required to displayed after validation of minLength

properties.name: pattern
properties.description: Accept RegEx patterns for text fields.example pattern=[a-z0-9]

properties.name: allowBlank
properties.description: true to make this field required.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: A string value displayed in the input (if supported) when the control is empty.

properties.name: errorMsg
properties.description: Error Message required to displayed after validation

css.name: input-control
css.description: extual form controls—like <input>s,<textarea>s—are styled with the .input-control class
